column4: With "telnet localhost 25", it works when I send an email, but with php mail's function it doesn't, even though I have localhost and port 25 configured in my php.ini, I don't get any error message, the mail is just not sent, why?
is it logged elsewhere?  web/apache error logs?
no it was just a script launched in cli to test if it works
it's strange because the mail function returns true, where is the mail if I don't receive it? Is there a queue or something?
